sphere.internal

Class CommentServiceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sphere.internal.CommentServiceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommentService

    @Immutable
public class CommentServiceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommentService
    CommentService with Play-specific async methods. Additional methods are exposed via Sphere.currentCustomer().
